title: Machine Learning Engineer – Recommendation Systems
description:
As a Machine Learning Engineer, you will design and optimize recommendation algorithms for our Audio Stories and Podcasting Platform. You’ll work on ML pipelines, model deployment, and real-time inference systems to enhance personalized content discovery.

Responsibilities


Model Development: Build and optimize recommendation models for content ranking and retrieval.
MLOps & Deployment: Develop scalable ML pipelines for training, deployment, and monitoring.
System Design: Architect real-time inference systems with high availability and low latency.
Data-Driven Insights: Analyze user interactions to improve recommendation strategies.
Collaboration: Work closely with engineering, product, and data teams to align ML initiatives with business goals.


Requirements


Experience: 3-4 years in Machine Learning, focusing on recommendation systems.
Technical Skills:
Expertise in Python, SQL, PyTorch, TensorFlow
Strong understanding of ranking algorithms, deep learning, and MLOps
Experience with real-time ML serving architectures
Business Impact: Proven ability to deliver measurable improvements in user engagement through ML solutions.
Bonus:
Experience in OTT platforms
Publications or patents in recommendation systems


Why Join KUKU?


Stock Options – Own a part of the company based on performance.
Great Team – Work with smart, ambitious people.
Big Impact – Entertain over 4 million customers monthly.


About KUKU

Founded in 2018, KUKU is India’s leading storytelling platform, offering a vast digital library of audio stories, short courses, and vertical microdramas. We deliver immersive entertainment and education through our OTT platforms: Kuku FM, Guru, Kuku TV, and more. With a mission to deliver high-quality, personalized stories across genres from entertainment across multiple formats and languages, KUKU continues to push boundaries and redefine India’s entertainment industry.
